title: #290: Seduced: Inside the NXIVM Cult - Part 3
description:
Laura and Jim, continue their conversation with filmmakers Cecilia Peck and Inbal B. Lessner, creators of the incredible STARZ doc-series “Seduced: Inside the Nxivm Cult”. Laura and Jim breakdown how the grooming process is enhanced by enablers and how the cult leader gaslight so many of his victims.

You can watch this amazing documentary series on STARZ with a free trail by going to this link https://amzn.to/3naY1YV.

https://seduceddocumentary.com
